H0.text: Protists are considered by scientists to be the oldest eukaryotes.

H1.text: Bivalves are considered by scientists to be the oldest eukaryotes.

H2.text: Arthropods are considered by scientists to be the oldest eukaryotes.

H3.text: Ciliate are considered by scientists to be the oldest eukaryotes.

A4.text: As a result, the early fossil record of protists is equivalent to the early record of eukaryotic life.

A5.text: Before the existence of land plants, animals and fungi, all eukaryotes were protists.
